Class QuizServant

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              server.QuizServant
All Implemented Interfaces:
QuizServices, java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
public class QuizServant
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements QuizServices

Author:
reinhard The Servant class provides the server functionality
